summary: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.
cast: Helen Hunt|Bill Paxton|Cary Elwes|Jami Gertz|Philip Seymour Hoffman|Lois Smith|Alan Ruck|Sean Whalen|Scott Thomson|Todd Field|Joey Slotnick|Wendle Josepher|Jeremy Davies|Zach Grenier|Gregory Sporleder|Patrick Fischler|Nicholas Sadler|Ben Weber|Anthony Rapp|Erik LaRay Harvey|Abraham Benrubi|Jake Busey|Melanie Hoopes|J. Hamilton|Anneke de Bont|Thomas E. Bentley|Darryl Cox|Mark Falvo|Ben Jackson|David Dillinger Jefferis|Brad Masters|April Warren
keywords: crashing a car into a house|storm chaser|disaster|tornado|eating
title: Twister
